Number of bureau fire investigations have

decreased from 2016 to 2020 in West Harlem

Precincts 26 and 30 contributed a total of 496 fire

investigations from 2016 to 2020. Over that time,

the number of fire investigations on average decreased

by 11.5 fires per year in Precinct 26 and 6.75 fires per

year in Precinct 30. Moreover, there was a 51 percent

and 30 percent decrease in fire investigations from

2018 to 2019 in Precincts 26 and 30, respectively.

Precinct 26

Precinct 30

Number of bureau fire investigations have decreased from

2016 to 2020 in West Harlem

Precincts 26 and 30 contributed a total of 496 fire investigations from 2016 to 2020.

Over that time, the number of fire investigations on average decreased by 11.5 fires

per year in Precinct 26 and 6.75 fires per year in Precinct 30. Moreover, there was a

51 percent and 30 percent decrease in fire investigations from 2018 to 2019 in

Precincts 26 and 30, respectively.

Number of bureau fire investigations have decreased from 2016 to 2020

in West Harlem

Precincts 26 and 30 contributed a total of 496 fire investigations from 2016 to 2020. Over that time, the number of fire investigations

on average decreased by 11.5 fires per year in Precinct 26 and 6.75 fires per year in Precinct 30. Moreover, there was a 51 percent and

30 percent decrease in fire investigations from 2018 to 2019 in Precincts 26 and 30, respectively.
